title: The Chinese version of the Gamesir Nova 2 Lite is getting an Iron Man Edition
description: GameSir has announced an Iron Man edition of its wireless controller, the Morning Star 2 a.k.a. Nova 2 Lite. There will also be three other special editions, two of which are tied to Chinese video games.

title: China Market Update: Massive Inflow Into Hong Kong Stocks From Mainland China Overnight
description: Asian equities had a strong day, led by Australia, South Korea, Taiwan, Thailand, and Vietnam, while India underperformed, as the US dollar weakened overnight.

title: Lenovo launches two new lightweight tablets with flagship and mid-range hardware at the helm
description: Lenovo has launched two new lightweight tablets with modern MediaTek and Qualcomm chipsets. Arriving as the Xiaoxin Tablet 12.1 and Xiaoxin Tablet Pro GT, the pair are both relatively thin despite their internal hardware too.

title: Alibaba to Shut Costco-Like China Stores After Rivalry Heats Up
description: Alibaba Group Holding Ltd. plans to gradually wind down the last of its Costco-like members-only stores, underscoring its retreat from a hyper-competitive Chinese retail arena.

title: Chinese retailer JD to launch five discount stores as competition intensifies
description: The first outlet in Zhuozhou will span 5,000 square metres and will carry everything from detergent to chocolate, with prices intended to be below prevailing market levels. JD first entered the market last year with the opening of two smaller discount stores …
